hero.title: The Old Crown Girton: Historic Thatched Pub & Authentic Nepalese Restaurant
hero.subtitle: Welcome to Girton's unique dining destination, where the largest thatched pub in the country serves exceptional Nepalese cuisine alongside beloved British pub classics.
hero.description: Just minutes from Cambridge and Girton College, we're your family-friendly, dog-welcoming village hub for memorable meals and community gathering.

story.title: Our Story
story.introduction: Located in the picturesque village of Girton, just minutes from Cambridge, Old Crown offers a truly unique dining experience. We proudly serve authentic Nepalese cuisine alongside traditional pub classics, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere for locals and visitors alike.

timeline.title: The Village Heart
timeline.description: For centuries, The Old Crown has been at the heart of Girton village life. Our historic thatched building - recognized as the largest thatched pub in the country - has witnessed countless community gatherings and celebrations.

timeline.title: Culinary Evolution
timeline.description: Under various managements, The Old Crown experimented with different culinary directions, including a period as an upscale gastropub. Each era added to our rich tapestry while maintaining our essential village pub character.

timeline.title: The Nepalese-British Fusion
timeline.description: Under current management, we've discovered our unique identity: combining authentic Nepalese cuisine with traditional British pub classics. This fusion represents Cambridge's multicultural community while honoring our heritage.

cta.title: Ready to Book?
cta.description: Experience the perfect blend of Nepalese hospitality and British pub tradition.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.text: Absolutely wonderful! The Nepalese dishes are authentic and delicious, and the traditional pub atmosphere is so welcoming. Perfect for families.

items.name: Mike Thompson
items.text: Great food and fantastic service. The best of both worlds - proper pub classics and amazing curry. Highly recommended!

items.question: Do you accept bookings?
items.answer: Yes, we accept bookings online or by phone. We recommend booking in advance, especially for weekends and special events.

items.question: Are you family-friendly?
items.answer: Absolutely! We welcome families with children until 9pm. We have a children's menu and high chairs available.

items.question: Do you offer takeaway?
items.answer: Yes, we offer takeaway for both our Nepalese and British menu items. Call us on 01223 276027 to place your order.

items.question: Is parking available?
items.answer: Yes, we have free parking available for our customers.
